resources.string: It\'s time to put cigarettes in the past. StopPuff will help you track your progress, motivate yourself, and celebrate victories over the habit.
Every smoke-free day is an investment in your health. We will count your \"clean\" days and show you how they increase.
How much money do you spend on vaping every day?
This will help us calculate how much you\'ll save when you quit.
Enter the approximate amount you spend on a typical day. Even if it\'s not every day, we\'ll still calculate the average.
